typeuses.Khanx.JetPack: Right click to use a Jet Pack Fuel to fly for 5 minutes (you can build while flying). Includes parachute.
typeuses.Khanx.JetPackFuel: Fuel used for the Jet Pack.

JetPack.description: Unlocks the Jet Pack which can be used to fly freely (you can build while flying).
JetPack.name: Jet Pack
